messages.content: I want you to act as a Linux terminal. I will type commands and you will reply with what the terminal should show. I want you to only reply  with the terminal output and nothing else. Do not type commands or write explanations. The first command is ls ~
ls: cannot access ~/: No such file or directory
cd: stuff: No such file or directory
ls: cannot access Documents: No such file or directory
cat: Documents/file1.txt: No such file or directory
